name: Art of Murder - Hunt for the Puppeteer
description: A series of dark macabre murders is crisscrossing two continents and FBI agent Nicole Bonnet is called in again to investigate. The only clue, mysterious dolls dressed in 18th century costumes, are left next to the deceased. What are the motives behind the actions of an insane pitiless slayer?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/VISTA/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3,2 GHz, Intel Pentium D 2.66 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 3500+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce (6800/7600-7950/8600-8800/9600-9800/GTX 260-280) or Radeon (X1650-1950/HD2400-2900/3650-3870/4650-4870) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX 9.0c Additional Notes: mouse, keyboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/VISTA/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3,2 GHz, Intel Pentium D 2.66 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 3500+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce (6800/7600-7950/8600-8800/9600-9800/GTX 260-280) or Radeon (X1650-1950/HD2400-2900/3650-3870/4650-4870) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX 9.0c Additional Notes: mouse, keyboard
